attributes.action: Increase the tax allowance for Oaps and re-instate the winter fuel allowance
attributes.additional_details: Because it is grossly unfair on pensioners that have worked and contributed financially all their working lives
attributes.background: Pensioners should not be paying tax on their state pension and the winter fuel allowance should be re-instated for all pensioners and not means tested. If the government fails to act on this pensioners will refuse to vote in any elections

rejection.details:
